architectureStyle.description: Organic, purple, theocratic - designed to honor the Founders and control the Jem'Hadar and Vorta
keyElements: ORGANIC curves and shapes - like giant insects or sea creatures
PURPLE and VIOLET as primary colors - the Founders' aesthetic
Bioluminescent lighting - glowing panels, no harsh artificial light
Founder worship shrines and imagery throughout
NO sharp angles - everything flows and curves
Structures seem grown rather than built
Central pools or chambers for Founders to rest in liquid form
Jem'Hadar barracks are spartan, Vorta quarters are comfortable
Everything designed to remind subjects of Founder divinity
architectureStyle.colors: Purple, violet, lavender, with bioluminescent blue-purple accents
architectureStyle.materials: Bio-organic materials, living structural elements, membrane walls

buildings.name: Great Link Chamber
buildings.description: Sacred space where Founders can join the Great Link. Pool of changeling matter, cathedral-like reverence.

buildings.name: Founder Temple
buildings.description: Place of worship. Vorta and Jem'Hadar come to pay respects to their gods. Founder statues.

buildings.name: Dominion Command
buildings.description: Military headquarters. Where Vorta commanders and Jem'Hadar Firsts coordinate operations.

buildings.name: Ketracel-White Facility
buildings.description: Produces the drug Jem'Hadar need to survive. Most critical and heavily guarded facility.

buildings.name: Jem'Hadar Barracks
buildings.description: Housing for soldiers. Spartan, functional, with white dispensers and weapons storage.

buildings.name: Vorta Administrative Center
buildings.description: Where Vorta administrators manage the Dominion's affairs. Comfortable, organized.

buildings.name: Cloning Facility
buildings.description: Where Vorta are cloned and Jem'Hadar are bred. Rows of maturation chambers.

buildings.name: Genetic Engineering Lab
buildings.description: Creates and modifies species to serve the Founders. Jem'Hadar enhancement, Vorta programming.

buildings.name: Communications Relay
buildings.description: Long-range subspace communication with Dominion space. Shaped like organic tower.

buildings.name: Shipyard Control
buildings.description: Oversees construction of Jem'Hadar ships. Organic-looking administrative facility.

buildings.name: Occupation Headquarters
buildings.description: Controls subjugated worlds. Vorta Overseer's office, Jem'Hadar garrison.

buildings.name: Punishment Chamber
buildings.description: Where those who defy the Founders are dealt with. Jem'Hadar do not require prisons - only execution.

buildings.name: Resource Extraction
buildings.description: Harvests materials from conquered worlds. Efficient, uncaring of environmental damage.

buildings.name: Diplomatic Mission
buildings.description: Embassy for negotiation. Vorta diplomats excel at manipulation and false promises.

buildings.name: Training Facility
buildings.description: Where Jem'Hadar learn combat. They emerge from birth able to fight, but tactics are trained.

buildings.name: Surveillance Center
buildings.description: Monitors subject populations. The Founders see all, know all.

buildings.name: Propaganda Bureau
buildings.description: Spreads the message of Founder benevolence. Resistance is futile AND sinful.

buildings.name: Medical Research
buildings.description: Studies diseases - both to cure Founders and to use as weapons against solids.

buildings.name: Energy Generation
buildings.description: Power plant with organic aesthetic. Provides energy for facilities.

buildings.name: Defense Battery
buildings.description: Polaron beam weapons and torpedo launchers. Organic-looking but deadly.

buildings.name: Species Processing
buildings.description: Evaluates conquered species for usefulness. Some serve, others are eliminated.

buildings.name: Weyoun Memorial
buildings.description: Honors fallen Vorta administrators. New clones visit to absorb memories.

buildings.name: Victory Monument
buildings.description: Celebrates Dominion conquests. Names of subjugated worlds inscribed.

buildings.name: Founder Residence
buildings.description: Private quarters for Founders on solid worlds. Pool chambers, privacy, morphogenic fields.
